name: Territory Cleanup
description: The Customs, Woods, and Shoreline is under increasingly frequent attacks by different bandit gangs, this seriously interfered with my friends' operations. Help them with their Scav problem and we'll send a handsome reward your way. Long story short, go teach the bandits a lesson.
success_message: Good job! Of course, there is enough scum in Tarkov, others will come for sure. But at least they will think twice before tearing the place apart.
